verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: lashed] out [ARGM-TMP: Saturday] [ARG1: at a demand by China for U.S. airlines to stop describing Taiwan and Hong Kong as separate countries] , [ARGM-ADV: calling the request “ Orwellian nonsense] . ”

The Trump administration lashed out Saturday at a demand by China for [ARG0: U.S. airlines] to [V: stop] [ARG1: describing Taiwan and Hong Kong as separate countries] , calling the request “ Orwellian nonsense . ”

The Trump administration lashed out Saturday at a demand by China for [ARG0: U.S. airlines] to stop [V: describing] [ARG1: Taiwan and Hong Kong] [ARG2: as separate countries] , calling the request “ Orwellian nonsense . ”

[ARG0: The Trump administration] lashed out Saturday at a demand by China for U.S. airlines to stop describing Taiwan and Hong Kong as separate countries , [V: calling] [ARG1: the request] [ARG2: “ Orwellian nonsense] . ”
